trans-unit.source: Provides methods for persisting Web server controls at design-time.
trans-unit.target: 提供在設計階段保存的 Web 伺服器控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: The ControlPersister class provides methods that can persist a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> control or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface implementation as a string of aspx code.
trans-unit.target: ControlPersister 類別提供方法，可以保存<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>介面實作 aspx 程式碼的字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法的實作由所驅動中繼資料屬性，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>， <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Web Forms page designer does not support the `Reset``PropertyName` method that is optionally exposed by Microsoft Windows Forms-based controls for property persistence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Web Forms 網頁設計工具不支援`Reset``PropertyName`選擇性屬性持續性的 Microsoft Windows Form 控制項所公開的方法。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface by parsing a string of control- or template-persistence data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> class methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>物件或<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>介面藉由剖析控制項或範本持續性資料的字串，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser>類別方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表指定之控制項的永續性的形式的資料字串。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>實作能正確運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>來擷取設計工具主應用程式指定的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>保存。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項的永續性的形式的字串。

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 輸出至指定<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>表示指定之控制項的永續性的形式的資料字串

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>實作能正確運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>來擷取設計工具主應用程式指定的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the persisted control data to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>輸出控制項的永續性的資料。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>保存。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示指定的控制項，使用指定的設計工具主應用程式的持續性的形式的資料字串。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>實作能正確運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>保存。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>也就是設計工具的主控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項的永續性的形式的字串。

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: 會輸出一個字串，代表指定之永久的格式的指定控制項資料的<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>，使用指定的設計工具主應用程式。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>實作能正確運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the persisted control data to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>輸出控制項的永續性的資料。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>保存。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>也就是設計工具的主控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 取得可以保存指定控制項的內部屬性的資料字串。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>實作能正確運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The component to persist the inner properties of.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的內部屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>也就是設計工具的主控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the information to persist about the inner properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要保存控制項的內部屬性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: 輸出的資料可以保存內部屬性的指定之控制項的指定字串<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>，使用指定的設計工具主應用程式。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>實作能正確運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>使用。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The component to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的元件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>也就是設計工具的主控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表指定的範本永久的格式的資料字串。

trans-unit.source: The PersistTemplate method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: PersistTemplate 方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>介面實作，才能順利運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The template to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的範本。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>也就是設計工具的主控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the template.
trans-unit.target: 表示範本的永久的格式的字串。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 將資料表示指定的範本永久的格式到指定的字串寫入<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>物件。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The PersistTemplate method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: PersistTemplate 方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>介面實作，才能順利運作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to write the persisted template data to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>寫入保存的範本資料。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The template to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保存的範本。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>也就是設計工具的主控制項。
